M

Message - Class in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity
Represents a Message record in the database
Message() - Constructor for class pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity.Message
Constructs a Message object.
Message(String, String, Date, boolean, User, User, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity.Message
Constructs a Message with the text, subject, date of added, recipient isAvtice status, sender, recipient, recipient isRead status, sender isActive status and sender isActive status.
MessageController - Class in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller
The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request.
MessageController(MessageService, UserService, Environment, AccessLevelControl, SearchEngineUtils) - Constructor for class pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.MessageController
Constructs a MessageController with the MessageService, UserService, Environment, AccessLevelControl and SearchEngineUtils.
MessageDAO - Interface in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao
Interface for performing database operations on Message objects.
MessageDAOImpl - Class in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao
Repository class for performing database operations on Message objects.
MessageDAOImpl(SessionFactory) - Constructor for class pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.dao.MessageDAOImpl
Constructs a MessageDAOImpl with the SessionFactory.
MessageService - Interface in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service
Interface for managing Message objects.
MessageServiceImpl - Class in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service
Service class for managing Message objects.
MessageServiceImpl(MessageDAO, UserDAO, MessageServiceUtils) - Constructor for class pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.MessageServiceImpl
Constructs a MessageServiceImpl with the MessageDAO, UserDAO and MessageServiceUtils.
MessageServiceUtils - Interface in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.utils
Interface used to perform operations for message service classes.
MessageServiceUtilsImpl - Class in pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.service.utils
